extendedInfo.description: â â â 2013 OFFICIAL DSA preparation materials â â â Includes LGV Theory Test and Hazard Perception Test Preparation Modules â â â From the developer of top rated driving theory test applications on iPhone, Mac and Android â â âThis app is all youâll ever need to pass your UK LGV Theory test! It combines 2 top rated applications in one and lets you prepare for both the theory test and the Hazard Perception part! Simply press the menu button and you will have an option to switch between the two modes (Option Key is usually located to the left from Home Key; it is a physical button situated directly below the display).Main features are:â Regularly updated. 2013 ready! â Complete. Includes ALL Latest Official DSA Revision questions and answers as well as FULL Official DSA Knowledge And Understanding Information for each question. â 10 Full Official DSA Videos With Explanationsâââ ANTI CHEATING MECHANISM âââ Check whether your clicking style has a potential to be judged as inappropriate by DVLAâ Extremely easy to useâ Works offline. Get as much training as you need when you need it. â Select any number of videos for your practice testâ Try your skills in the Mock Test as many times as you wish! â Comprehensive statistics average score and the number of clicks during last attemptâ Hazard Perception test overview â in addition to the official introduction we have compiled some very useful information about the test which will help you to better understand what to do and how to succeed!

reviews.title: The best thing ever well worth the money
reviews.comment: Best thing ever you will need this and only this and a lot of time passed my test today 3 questions wrong out of the 100 asked good percentage on my hpt as well would recommend to anyone. The coach mode has two 100% to go though it is not stated that clear at the start
reviews.author: Jonathan Gellion

reviews.title: Super learning app
reviews.comment: Love using this training program. It has so many questions and a great way of recording the progress i am making. I like the hint feature too if not sure about an answer. Best app i have bought!
reviews.author: Joey C

reviews.comment: best fiver ever spent just passed mine because of the app

reviews.title: Superb
reviews.comment: Hope it will help me :)

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: This apps perfect helped me pass with top marks :)

reviews.title: get on it people
reviews.comment: highly recommend this app. sat both my theory and hazzard perception yesterday and blitzed both thanks to this app :-D.

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Passed my theory test first time. Good that you can choose to do a smaller test as well as a full mock test. Would recommend.

reviews.title: Woowhoo
reviews.comment: Just passed 99 out of 100 using this tool.  Excellent job i whish i found this before spend any money on books. (Unninstall :)

reviews.title: Passed 1st time
reviews.comment: Great for coaching you through the daft questions and saves your time and money
reviews.author: Mark Benton

reviews.title: Best app available for C1 theory + Hp test
reviews.comment: Excellent app managed to get 99/100 for my theory test n the hazzard perception videos included were great practise for the that section of the test. Meant i didnt press to early, to late or to many times on the real thing. Great price for all you will need to ace the exams! Highly reccomended!
reviews.author: Daniel Hughes

reviews.title: Lgv
reviews.comment: Very good product for revising
reviews.author: Richard Campbell

reviews.title: Too much internal phone memory used
reviews.comment: Highly Recommended, Excellent App. 1000% Better than those from other authors.  Only problem is it uses a lot of phone internal memory and cannot be moved to a micro SD card, which is annoying for phones with low internal built in memory. Hence only 4/5 stars.

reviews.comment: this is by far the best practice app out there really clear and understandable
